hamjob200x wrote:

>Hi, I was wondering where I can get a copy of the game.  I can't find
>anywhere to download it. I used to have the $10 version but I had to
>reformat the computer and lost the copy.  Now the forgotten sages site
>is gone, and I have no clue where to get the game.
>  
>
your best option is probably openGlad.  You can get that at 
snowstorm.sourceforge.net.

Bjorn
